name: Deep Russian Depression
description: A young man, shocked by the death of his parents, begins to lose his mind. Soon, he notices that alcohol, with which he tried to fill his emptiness, no longer helps. He turns to a psychiatrist to prescribe treatment. Unexpectedly for everyone, the drugs that the doctor prescribed to him begin to help, but not for long. After some time, the world around him turns gray-red, reminding him of the meaninglessness of his existence.
